summary: Create an app/website for Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels with a premium black/white (Uber-style) branded frontend, including premium car rental booking (customized plans) plus tour/ticket booking services and inquiry/booking capture for the agency/admin.
architectural_notes: Plan for handling ~10,000 visits/day (performance/scalability considerations for frontend and canister APIs).
known_issues: Email and phone/SMS alerts requested, but platform/account currently does not support enabling outbound email/SMS notifications (blocked feature).
Domain name must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens; current domain string is invalid.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium cinematic hero banner showing a luxury black sedan or SUV on an open highway at dusk with a dramatic dark sky, high contrast black and white tones with subtle warm road lighting (hero-premium-travel.dim_1600x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive, branded frontend for “Blackrays Tours & Travel Agency” with a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component style) applied across all pages; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Implement public site pages and navigation for the agency: Home, About, Tour Packages, Package Details, Contact/Inquiry.
Add an authenticated admin area (Internet Identity) to manage content: create/edit/delete tour packages and view/update inquiries (e.g., mark as New/In Progress/Resolved).
Implement robust client-side data fetching and UX states using React Query for packages and inquiries (loading, empty, error states) and basic input validation for forms.
Add required generated brand images as static frontend assets and use them in the UI (do not serve images through the backend).

Update only the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1] (the Features section inner container div in HomePage) to render with a premium black/charcoal look: apply a dark background treatment, increase contrast to white/grey text, and ensure the section reads as “premium” via subtle borders, refined spacing, and restrained accent usage. Do not change any other elements outside this selected container; if descendant typography/colors need adjustments, apply them via parent-scoped Tailwind utility selectors on this container (e.g., [&_h2]:..., [&_p]:...) rather than editing other nodes.

Update all visible brand/name references across the site from “Blackrays Tours & Travel Agency” to “Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels”, including the header logo alt text and any hero/marketing copy that mentions the old brand.

Replace placeholder contact information across the site with the provided business contact details and leadership line: MD & Chairman: Om H Patil; Phone: 9373624669; Email: blackraystravelagency@gmail.com.

Add a prominent contact information block at the very start of the homepage (top of the initial interface or immediately after the hero starts), showing: Phone 9373624669, Email blackraystravelagency@gmail.com, and “MD & Chairman: Om H Patil”.

Adjust the global visual theme to a premium, Uber-like black/white/grey palette (reduce/remove warm amber/orange styling), ensuring consistent typography, contrast, and component styling across all public and admin pages.

Add a new public Car Rentals booking experience that captures customer details for customized car rental plans, including: vehicle type options (Sedan ₹2500/day, SUV ₹5000/day), driver required (yes/no), and short/long distance intent; store submissions as inquiries viewable in the existing admin inquiries list.

Extend the backend inquiry model and APIs to support capturing a customer phone number and an inquiry category/type (e.g., tour inquiry vs car rental booking), and update the admin inquiry listing and status update flow to display the added fields.

Select and configure a valid deployment domain/slug that includes the substring "blackrays" and satisfies the platform domain rules (5–50 characters, only letters, numbers, and hyphens). The previously attempted domain "blackrays-car-rentals-&-tours-and-travels" must not be used because it contains invalid characters.
Publish/deploy the current website so it is live and reachable at the configured domain/slug.

Rebuild the full Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels website, restoring all previously implemented features: branded frontend with premium black/white/grey (Uber-like) palette, public pages (Home, About, Tour Packages, Package Details, Contact/Inquiry, Car Rentals), authenticated admin area (Internet Identity) for managing packages and inquiries, React Query data fetching with loading/empty/error states, correct brand name 'Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels' throughout, business contact details (Phone: 9373624669, Email: blackraystravelagency@gmail.com, MD & Chairman: Om H Patil) displayed prominently on the homepage and in the footer, car rental booking form (Sedan ₹2500/day, SUV ₹5000/day, driver required yes/no, short/long distance), inquiry model with phone number and category/type fields, and the deployment slug 'blackrays-tours-travels' (valid: letters/numbers/hyphens only, 5–50 chars).

Add a 'Custom Travel Packages' public page and section. The page must allow users to submit a personalized travel package inquiry by specifying: destination type (India / Abroad), specific location/destination (free text), number of travelers, trip duration (number of days/nights), and preferred travel dates (optional). On submission, store the request as an inquiry in the backend with category 'custom_package'. The page must be accessible from the main navigation and from the homepage.

Update the Car Rentals page to add a per-km pricing mode alongside (or replacing) the existing daily rate. Display clearly: Sedan at ₹13/km and SUV at ₹21/km. The booking form must capture estimated distance (in km) and calculate/display an estimated fare. Store the distance and estimated fare in the car rental inquiry submitted to the backend.

Replace the hot air balloon hero image on the website with a new premium travel/luxury car rental themed image. The replacement image must feel high-end, cinematic, and consistent with the black/white/grey premium palette. Update all references to the old image asset with the new one.

Add a Terms & Conditions page and a visible T&C notice on the Car Rentals booking page. The T&C must prominently state: 'Without driver — if anything happens to the vehicle, the consumer is fully liable for all repair and associated costs.' Include additional standard rental terms as appropriate. Link to the T&C page from the footer and from the car rental booking form (checkbox acknowledgment before submission).

Add a Railway Ticket Bookings section/page to the website. The page should explain the railway ticket booking assistance service offered by Blackrays, allow users to submit a ticket booking inquiry (origin, destination, travel date, number of passengers, class preference, contact details), and store it as an inquiry in the backend with category 'railway_booking'. Link the page from main navigation and homepage.

Add a Flight Ticket Bookings section/page to the website. The page should describe Blackrays' flight booking assistance service, allow users to submit a flight booking inquiry (origin city/airport, destination city/airport, travel date, number of passengers, trip type one-way/round-trip, contact details), and store it as an inquiry in the backend with category 'flight_booking'. Link the page from main navigation and homepage.

Update the homepage to include prominent cards or sections for all service offerings: Custom Travel Packages, Car Rentals (per-km), Railway Ticket Bookings, and Flight Ticket Bookings — each with a brief description and CTA button linking to the respective page. Ensure the overall homepage layout remains premium and consistent with the black/white/grey Uber-like aesthetic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an app for Blackrays Tours & Travel Agency (overall app creation request).
Add backend data models and APIs to support the public catalog and inquiry flow: store tour packages and store customer inquiries in the single Motoko actor.
Add Car Rental services section with short/long distance cab booking flow that captures customer details and notifies the agency/admin with booking info.
Update site content to include Managing Director (Om Hemant Patil), business address, and contact details (phone/email) for queries.
Adjust the visual theme to a premium dark look using primarily black/white/grey styling across the website.
Add customer notification alerts so that when a user submits info (or logs in), the agency receives details immediately via email and phone/SMS.
Add Ticket Booking services/pages alongside tours and car rentals (as an additional offering).
Add car rental pricing display and options: Sedan ₹2500/day, SUV ₹5000/day, driver available; support customized plans and short/long distance booking.
Update branding/name to “Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels” and ensure contact info is displayed at the very start (top) of the homepage.
Choose a valid domain name that includes “blackrays” (letters/numbers/hyphens only, 5–50 chars) and make the website live (deploy/publish).
Add personalized travel packages customized by location (India & abroad), number of travelers, and duration of stay.
Add per-km car rental pricing: Sedan ₹13/km, SUV ₹21/km based on distance (in addition to or replacing daily rates).
Remove hot air balloon image from the website and replace with a premium travel/car rental themed image.
Add Terms & Conditions: without driver, if anything happens to the vehicle the consumer is liable for repair costs.
Add Railway Ticket Bookings section/page to the website.
Add Flight Ticket Bookings section/page to the website.

Extend the backend inquiry model to support a 'custom_package' inquiry category. Add fields for: destinationType (text: 'India' or 'Abroad'), destination (text), numberOfTravelers (Nat), durationDays (Nat), and preferredDates (optional text). Ensure the existing submitInquiry or equivalent API accepts these fields and the admin listing displays them.

Extend the backend inquiry model to support 'railway_booking' and 'flight_booking' categories with their respective optional fields. For railway: originStation, destinationStation, travelDate, passengerCount, railClass. For flight: originCity, destinationCity, departureDate, returnDate, tripType, passengerCount, cabinClass. All existing categories must remain unaffected.
